nextgen.core.annotation
Class AbstractAnnotationCollection<T extends Annotation>

java.lang.Object
  nextgen.core.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCollection<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationCollection<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlignmentModel, AnnotationList
public abstract class AbstractAnnotationCollection<T extends Annotation>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnnotationCollection<T>

Author:
engreitz Abstract class for functions common to both AlignmentModel and AnnotationSet. Mostly here for consistency in function between the two classes

AbstractAnnotationCollection

Method Detail

getBasesCovered

public int getBasesCovered(Annotation region)
Description copied from interface: AnnotationCollection
This method will return the total number of bases that are covered by alignments in the collection If discontinuous region, it will only count blocks. The maximum possible value is defined by region.getTranscriptSize(); Annotations counted here do not need to be fully contained in the region.

Specified by:
getBasesCovered in interface AnnotationCollection<T extends Annotation>
Parameters:
region - The region to determine overlap
Returns:
